body:
A few things need to happen before the next tourney.
  • Senior staff need to take responsibility for their tournies, not pawn everything off onto officials.
  • Maps need to better developed, and finalized before the tourney is announced to prevent last minute map updates or confusion regarding which map version will be played.
  • Officials need to all be demoted. Every single official has failed to make avicus tournies even somewhat respectable and competitive.
  • New officials need be competent hack detectors, unlike almost all the current officials.
  • Gameplay needs to reflect avicus not ocn.
  • Advisor rank needs to be removed. Even the advisors don't know what the point of it is.
  • Refs need to be decently trained.
body_tagged:
A few things need to happen before the next tourney.
  • Senior staff need to take responsibility for their tournies, not pawn everything off onto officials.
  • Maps need to better developed, and finalized before the tourney is announced to prevent last minute map updates or confusion regarding which map version will be played.
  • Officials need to all be demoted. Every single official has failed to make avicus tournies even somewhat respectable and competitive.
  • New officials need be competent hack detectors, unlike almost all the current officials.
  • Gameplay needs to reflect avicus not ocn.
  • Advisor rank needs to be removed. Even the advisors don't know what the point of it is.
  • Refs need to be decently trained.
title: A Few Fixes for Tournaments
